markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Common Eurypterid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1151)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The smallest of the giant eurypterids can grow to about the size of a large dog. These eurypterids are a staple food for people living in marshlands, who add the meat to heavily spiced stews, but they're otherwise considered dangerous pests.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Common Eurypterid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1151)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 97</row>

**Perception** +2; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [wavesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=41) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +0

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +2 

</row>

**HP** 9

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> Stinger only.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, swim 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pincer +6,
**Damage** 1d6+2 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +6,
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing plus eurypterid venom

**Eurypterid Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 14 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 3** 1d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-234" />
name: Common Eurypterid
